divs: Sighting Detailswalking to my sisters to babysit I seen a round shape in the sky with stars in it ,I looked up at it and it swooped down on me and the stars didn't change,so I froze in fear, next I was in the same spot walking home, Everyone was looking for me because I never showed up to babysit,I went right to sleep and didn't remember any thing.for about 5 years,then I started to remember, and as soon as I started to remember, I would forget what I was talking about, this went on for about ten years, now I remember,just what I am telling you now,thats all, nut since I've had abduction dreams,so real I wake up terrified.I remeber like little creatures that looked like big ants about 3 feet tall.that move so fast,they are a blur,except when they stop.they seem to vibrate about an inch each way so I can't touch them.in my dreams they come to me and put a glass rod in my head that is lit up from the inside they put it inside my head right behind my earlobe.I see a flash of light and they're gone I have a lump behind my ear they do this,it has moved from left to right,it's really weird.I recently had a cat scan when the doctors looked at it they glanced at it looked at each other and took it off the light real fast I rmember seening a round thing on the cat scan but they said they never saw anything,weird I thiink they did.I want some one else to look at the catscan its at the va hospital in fargo ND.
